tool_description: Creates structured job descriptions from role requirements, company information, and job details with customizable sections and formatting.

job_title.description: The official title of the job position

department.description: Department or team the role belongs to

job_level.description: Job level: entry, mid, senior, executive, or director

employment_type.description: Employment type: full-time, part-time, contract, or internship

location.description: Job location or 'remote' for remote positions

required_qualifications.description: List of required qualifications and skills

preferred_qualifications.description: List of preferred but not required qualifications

company_description.description: Brief company description to include in posting

benefits.description: List of job benefits and perks

error_messages: Invalid job level: Use one of [entry, mid, senior, executive, director]
Invalid employment type: Use one of [full-time, part-time, contract, internship]
Insufficient responsibilities: Provide at least 3 key responsibilities
Too many qualifications: Limit required qualifications to 8 items maximum
Invalid experience range: Years of experience must be between 0-20
Empty required fields: job_title, department, job_level, employment_type, location, key_responsibilities, required_qualifications, and company_name are required
usage: Provide all required job details including title, department, level, type, location, responsibilities, qualifications, and company name. Optionally include preferred qualifications, company description, benefits, and experience requirements to create a comprehensive job description.

job_description_text.description: Complete formatted job description ready for posting

word_count.description: Total word count of the job description

sections_included.description: List of sections included in the job description

posting_id.description: Unique identifier for this job description
